_header: Saint John upon a time stood
_description: Gospel ‘In Vigilia sancti Andree’ in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion vppon a tyme stoodeAnd tweine of his disciples
                    goode…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God vs graunte þat ilke graceSo him to suwe to sen his
                    face. Amen.

                poet.a.1,

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
